dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Let us dive into the trending topics for Selena Gomez this May. There is a lot of news happening.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Exactly. The search queries are dominated by her role in the film Emilia Perez at the Cannes Film Festival.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: People are looking for reviews to see how the movie is performing. It is a big moment for her.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: We are also seeing a lot of interest in the business world regarding the Rare Beauty valuation news lately.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That brand has become massive. Meanwhile, fans of her television work are asking about Only Murders in the Building.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: They specifically want to know the Season 4 release date. It is one of the most anticipated shows right now.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Her personal life is also making headlines with new reports about her relationship with Benny Blanco being searched for.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: And we cannot forget her mental health advocacy, which remains a core part of her public profile and work.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It is clear that Selena is staying busy across multiple industries, from beauty to film and even television production.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: We will continue to follow these search trends as more information becomes available about her upcoming projects today.
